skill: Reimu can keep hovering in the air without automatically landing, and shrunk the hitbox of obstacles (gears) , making it easier to dodge.
chipDescription: A heavy and hard orb. It is in fact the key to Gensokyo.
expressions: Rhythm? Isn't it all about defeating the enemies?
Buro? That kid is kinda like Suika ... Noisy, but not annoying.
Have nothing to do, huh? Would you like a cup of tea?
Ughhh Yukari! Got tricked by her prank again and now I'm here!
Enough already, I did my part didn't I?
Do you ever get tired of poking me? You know that I'm not ticklish, right?
Props? Illustrations? Is there nothing more valuable?
You're welcome, please put my pay in the donation box~
I have made up my mind, how about building a shrine here too? This will double my income!
For what you've done to me, I will take double the payback!
Why are you so concerned about my armpits? There is no weak point here!
Want an S? That will cost you 100,000 yen. No? Then what?
reviewExpressions: Rhythm? Isn't it all about defeating the enemies?
Buro? That kid is kinda like Suika ... Noisy, but not annoying.
Have nothing to do, huh? Would you like a cup of tea?
Ughhh Yukari! Got tricked by her prank again and now I'm here!

Why are you so concerned about my armpits? There is no weak point here!

skill: Clear can automatically catch all the missed Blue Notes, Red Hearts, ghosts, and enemies with Heart. The automatically caught ghosts and enemies with Heart is "Perfect" judgment.
chipDescription: The crown which brings Clear falling to the ground, absolutely who hit by it will shout Ouch.
expressions: Born in the grave, standing for the return of glory! How about it, isn't it cool?
Fail comes here with me? What a clingy girl... Don't worry, I'll take care of her myself!
Clear will clear all the songs here! Eh... an awkward silence?
How long are you going to cool my heels? Hurry up and start playing with me! Come on, come on, come on!
Love from everyone is the source of my power, so always praise me~
Today is the day of solo with Fail, whoever loses will do whatever the winner says! Come and cheer me on!
Is that little zombie named Buro also resurrected from the graveyard? What...that is a cosplay?!
You want me to fight with the guitar... What if I destroy it? I mean the mob of monsters!
Just now! I saved another spectator who was almost bewitched by Fail. It was literally a close call.
I don't look like Fail. Obviously I'm in better shape... Yes, that's definitely true!
Eh? Eh? Ah... I can't take it anymore! If you want something, just say it!
Ahhhh, geez! To prevent you from poking me and thus losing the game, keep three meters away from now on!
reviewExpressions: Born in the grave, standing for the return of glory! How about it, isn't it cool?
Fail comes here with me? What a clingy girl... Don't worry, I'll take care of her myself!
Clear will clear all the songs here! Eh... an awkward silence?
How long are you going to cool my heels? Hurry up and start playing with me! Come on, come on, come on!
Love from everyone is the source of my power, so always praise me~
Today is the day of solo with Fail, whoever loses will do whatever the winner says! Come and cheer me on!
Is that little zombie named Buro also resurrected from the graveyard? What...that is a cosplay?!
You want me to fight with the guitar... What if I destroy it? I mean the mob of monsters!
Just now! I saved another spectator who was almost bewitched by Fail. It was literally a close call.
I don't look like Fail. Obviously I'm in better shape... Yes, that's definitely true!
Eh? Eh? Ah... I can't take it anymore! If you want something, just say it!
Ahhhh, geez! To prevent you from poking me and thus losing the game, keep three meters away from now on!

skill: Sister Marija will swap the locations of enemies in the sky and on the ground. Specifically, raiders, hanging hammers, and ordinary obstacles (gears) will be rolled over.
chipDescription: She finds the star shape more adorable for it’s a symbol of her belief.
expressions: A good sense of smell, careful planning, and swift handling—those are what I've learned at the Church.
Can enemies be defeated by prayers only? Of course not. So let's get started, while God is still in slumber.
You need not fear me. Only bad people are my target... Huh, are you here to confess?
Enemies? It-It is they that targeted me first. I just... beat them too hard...
If you are really a kind-hearted person, you should support me, as long as the result is correct, no...?
Even if you are against my approach, we are already accomplices... So what do you think should be done to traitors...
Unlike my devil who has a gentle soul, my angel is a naughty kid... Well, keep it a secret to the Church.
Wanna make a confession? Just tell me about it. I'm efficient~
Familiars, who have lived several hundreds of years, can even argue about either the bunny girl suit or the sailor suit is cuter for a whole day. Oh, this is really...
Behave yourself... This is not any doctrine, but something that even a child can understand...
Calm down, calm down, Marija... Don't submit to profane temptations. Come recite prayers. That's right, that's what you should do...
What a sinful person... you are. I really look forward to the day when you are punished by myself...

skill: Marisa can keep hovering in the air without automatically landing. She gains a 200% score bonus when catching Blue Notes or Red Hearts in full health.
chipDescription: A mighty self-made magical item that can shoot lasers when stuffed with mushrooms - use it to blast your way to Gensokyo!
expressions: I am the Great Magician—Kirisame Marisa! … Huh? You didn’t think it was me?
Not like someone, if your request brings me fun, I won't charge you ~ ☆
Treating every enemy with care is not my style. Let me teach you how to use Master Spark ~ ☆
It's Marija's book, I borrowed it! ...Taking a book can't be considered stealing!
The mushroom world is really complicated! It took me a night to do a little research! So—please don't look at me as if I were an overachiever.
My luck today is… future blessing?! Future blessing again? Isn't it  "Almost Misfortune "!!
Ah~ There are too many notes in some stages. Now, I understand how they feel when they see my danmaku…
Don't give me that"please do Love Sign Master Spark again"look! I'm not a busking magician!
I was called by a dangerous-looking girl in black to dust her car… Do I look like a maid?
What are you staring at?! Ah… How do you know there are bombs under my dress?
You can't eat that mushroom! It is… the magic mushroom, which can increase intimacy between you and who you love… I don't know the details! I didn't eat it!!
Stop—I handed over everything I stole... I took!If you dare do something that crosses the line, I'll call Reimu to sort you out!

skill:
Amiya earns more Fever Energy by repelling enemies. When Fever Mode is active, she will convert "Miss" into "Great", 
and "Great" into "Perfect".However, Amiya will not earn any Fever Energy for 3 seconds after Fever Mode ends.
chipDescription: One of Amiya's ten rings. Not sure which finger it's for, but it definitely won't fit you, Doctor.
expressions: The very thought of performing before you is making me a little nervous, Doctor... but I'll do my best!
Running with music makes it easier. I must share this discovery with Miss Dobermann. It'll be great if she uses this in training!
There are still many stages to challenge, Doctor... but make sure you get some rest, okay?
Do the enemies feel pain if I knock them back with my Originium Arts? What? They enjoy this...? Alright then.
Perhaps you can try mashing the buttons to get through the enemy mob. Don't give up now, Doctor.
Swing that violin like a weapon? If I must...
Strategy matters, even in rhythm games. Let's have a mission briefing, Doctor.
I just plucked up my courage to ask Miss Marija for some violin tips, but she just picked me up and spun me around and around... Was that a yes or no?
Please predict the charts based on our intel about the boss, Doctor! What? You can't? I'm sorry.
My violin skills have improved? Thank you, Doctor... you're also getting better at the game.
I'm so happy to hear people around us say how reliable you are, Doctor. But does that mean you're secretly doing overtime? I thought you told me you were getting some rest...
Me? No, I'm not nervous... but getting stage fright is pretty normal, Doctor. Do let me know if you're nervous as well.

skill: Ola will not get hurt when bursting into Fever.But in exchange for the temporary command, he can only use Sis's skill? His rebellion is totally frustrated!
chipDescription: A mountain of champion belts at home? How about we take them to Sis and transform them into henshin device?!
expressions: I just found out I only have Sis's skill... Um, maybe it's okay. She is powerful after all...
Ahhhhh, I'm so nervous. Think back to what Sis once told me: "Run away from the fight you can't win."Run away from the fight I can't win. Run away from the fight I can't win...
Wow, I'm really weak in human form. I have a bad feeling that I'm gonna make a fool of myself... Oh, no...
Gloves, check. Headgear, check. Henshin device, check. Skill, check. Good! I'm invincible today!!
Ola ola ola ola ola! My endless punches can defeat any enemy!!
This is my trump card, Bear Punch! If that's not enough, Bear Punch Plus! Still not enough? Bear Punch Ultimate!
Stamina—As long as I have it, I can take care of all my enemies! You should get more exercise like me, partner!
Bear, sanjou! How about that? I'm a copycat? It’s not that obvious!
Sis is in that bear in pink braces? It can't be! Wait a minute, let me look again...?
Feel lonely because sisters are not here? Me, too. But I can play with you like sisters did... Maybe?
I used to feel your gaze when I was in bear form...
But now I don't have the soft, furry tummy. So... that means... you have nothing to feel, do you?
